org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor

Class AbstractPromiseToListenableFutureAdapter<S,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor.AbstractPromiseToListenableFutureAdapter<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of object expected from the Promise
    T - the type of object expected from the ListenableFuture
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<T>, ListenableFuture<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PassThroughPromiseToListenableFutureAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractPromiseToListenableFutureAdapter<S,T>
extends Object
implements ListenableFuture<T>
    Adapts a reactor Promise to ListenableFuture optionally converting the result Object type <S> to the expected target type <T>.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

      • addCallback

        public void addCallback(ListenableFutureCallback<? super T> callback)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Registers the given callback to this ListenableFuture. The callback will be triggered when this Future is complete or, if it is already complete, immediately.
        Specified by:
        addCallback in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to register
